attributes.action: Reduce the 6 month quarantine for pets entering the U.K. to no longer than 3 months.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pets take terrible strain and stress during this 6 months.  It is unnecessary.  The longest period needed for quarantine is 3 months.  I have seen animals deteriorate terribly in this time, verging on inhumane treatment for pets!  Our pets also have rights and it's up to us, as pet owners, to speak up for them!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
